channel.title: Project Management on Embedded Systems Design
channel.description: Recent content in Project Management on Embedded Systems Design

item.title: What is a Gantt Chart?
item.description: A Gantt Chart is a common project management tool that helps teams understand the phases of a project, deadlines, critical paths, and interdependencies between tasks. It is important to gain experience predicting how long tasks take in order to calibrate your time management.
